message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its value to us, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  That price is a little high for me right now. Would you be willing to come down to $7,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $8,200. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate you being willing to work with me, Alice.  How about $7,500?  That's more in line with my budget.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider $7,800 as a compromise. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while accommodating your financial situation.
